activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#2600
activity.text:
- [x] Hid review alert when the patient is discharged  
- [x] Hid review alert when a daily round is created or when update is made after review time
- [x] In daily rounds form, added a hint to show the next expected review time
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29787772/171404644-52b17c31-8f78-4971-9003-0d95d70508a6.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29787772/171404899-bbcc2aee-d4e6-45fe-a2e6-1551b06ad3a7.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29787772/171404557-dc864a5c-7fcb-4c58-b4a1-04349bdfccec.png)



_**Considerations:**_

- _Because we are storing absolute time in the backend and here in the frontend we are using relative time for `review_time` without any reference, it is not possible to set previous review time value in the form, so I went with the hint that notifies the user about the previous review time_

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#2412
activity.text:
As of now, we have 2 ways to access the notifications list, one is to use notification in the side menu bar and other is to use the floating icon, this is leading to an unexpected behavior of opening more than 1 notification list slideover at the same time i.e., when we click on floating icon, it opens 1 instance of the notifications list and we also can click on side menu bar to open another instance at the same time

so,
- [ ] create a global state for isNotificationsListOpen in AppRouter

open_prs.title: Moved covid vaccination related fields to medical history section in PatientRegister
Removed max height and filtered users by doctor type in DoctorVideoSlideover
Added mark as read feature for NotificationsList
Made first_name and last_name mandatory in UserAdd
Added drag and drop feature in Shifting BoardView
Added floating notification icon in AppRouter
fixed spacing issues in Consultation Details
added browser confirmation for uncheduling in Agenda
Refactored Patients from ruby-html to rescript-react
